QuestData.Title: Chiselgrip, the Heart of the Steppes
QuestData.Description: We're headed to Chiselgrip, right in the center of these steppes. We'll rendezvous with the Thorium Brotherhood there, as well as with my father.$b$bAre you familiar with the Brotherhood? Those dark iron dwarves have helped me out more than once. We may need their help again.$b$bWe'll pass through Black Tooth Hovel on our way there. What do you say we kill a few of the Blackrock while we travel? I'm getting a little restless here in this camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 15 Blackrock troops on your way to Chiselgrip.
QuestData.RewardText: You'll have to excuse me, but we're not taking visitors right now. I'll ask you to leave Chiselgrip out the same door you came in.$b$bOh, Ariok... is that you?
